de.weltraumschaf.commons.IOStreams

  • Packages that use IOStreams 
    Package Description
    de.weltraumschaf.commons
    Library of classes used in several projects.

    • Uses of IOStreams in de.weltraumschaf.commons

      Methods in de.weltraumschaf.commons that return IOStreams 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IOStreams InvokableAdapter.getIoStreams() 
      IOStreams Invokable.getIoStreams()
      Get stream object for I/O.
      static IOStreams IOStreams.newDefault()
      Creates same as newDefault(java.lang.String) but with DEFAULT_ENCODING as encoding.
      static IOStreams IOStreams.newDefault(String encoding)
      Creates a new streams object initialized with System.in, System.out, and System.err.
      Methods in de.weltraumschaf.commons with parameters of type IOStreams 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void InvokableAdapter.main(Invokable invokable, IOStreams ioStreams)
      Inject the I/O streams to the invokable and then calls Invokable.init() and then Invokable.execute().
      static void InvokableAdapter.main(Invokable invokable, IOStreams ioStreams, boolean debug)
      Inject the I/O streams to the invokable and then calls Invokable.init() and then Invokable.execute().
      void InvokableAdapter.setIoStreams(IOStreams ioStreams) 
      void Invokable.setIoStreams(IOStreams ioStreams)
      Set stream object for I/O.
